title: Issue updating client!! Pls Help
body: Every time I try to update my client it will hit a random % before telling me that an unexpected error has occurred, I'm not sure what is causing this at all? Is anyone else having the same issue or found a fix? Please help!

replies.body:
Have you already tried the solutions provided in the patching troubleshooting thread? If not, give them a go here:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/PuEpZLzo-having-patching-issues-try-these-solutions

Let me know if the problem persists.
Yup, currently trying to fully reinstall. Still occuring to me. Sigh.
